name: myntmarket
tag_list: micro-freelance, espaol, spanish, microservices, trabajo-online, online-work, gigs, fiverr
overview:
MyntMarket is the largest outsourcing and crowdsourcing marketplace for small business & individuals in Spanish. We have hundreds of thousands of satisfied customers from Spain, Latin America & USA.

Through our website, individuals or companies can hire micro-freelancers to do work in areas such as graphic design, social media marketing, programming, writing, data entry, linkbuilding, SEO and web design works… at a reduced & highly competitive fix rate (ranging from 5 to 450 €)

The web is fully integrated with twitter, facebook, linkedin, etc. allowing the sellers to market their gigs accross the web, using viral marketing strategies.

All the payments are handle by Paypal, giving user confidence to use the application. The money flows worldwide, and myntmarket looks for the security of the transactions.

The web is focus on the spanish-speaking market. Ideally, buyers will come from Spain, Europe, and sellers from Latino-America, where 5, 10 or 20 euros have an extra value…

We connect over 15,000 employers and freelancers globally. The average job is under €20, making outsourcing for the first time extremely cost effective for small businesses.

milestones.description: Series A funding - Mola.com acquires a minority stake in myntmarket.com
milestones.source_description: Mola.com acquires a minority stake in myntmarket.com

milestones.description: MyntMarket to launch a completely new design and brand name in June 2012
milestones.source_description: Mola.com presents its startups to VC investors
